ctx: P: Prenosnik IBM T30 - brezhiben, malo rabljen, XP
content:
Izredno ugodno prodam brezhiben in skoraj nerabljen prenosnik IBM T30 naslednjih lastnosti:

* Intel P4 Mobile 2000 MHz processor
* 256 Mb DDR
* 35 Gb HDD
* DVD/CDRW
* 14" LCD TFT (1024x768)
* Grafika ATI radeon 7500 16 Mb vga
* AC'97 sound
* Intel 82559 LAN 100
* 56,6 kbps modem
* Video-OUT
* Infra port
* 2x PCMCIA
* 2x USB port
* 1x LPT port
* PS2 port
* 1x COM Prot
* Lučka za osvetlitev tipkovnice
* Polnilec

Zraven dam tudi prednaložene licenčne WIN XP. Nalepka z serijsko številko na prenosniku.

SAMO 320,00 EUR. 


Podrobne karakteristike tukaj....
IBM ThinkPad T30 2366-R7G 
CPU and Memory 
Processor Manufacturer Intel 
Processor Class Mobile Intel(R) Pentium(R) 4 
Processor Speed 2.0 GHz 
Installed Memory 512 MB 
Maximum Memory 1 GB 
Memory Technology DDR SDRAM 
Cache Size 256 kB 
Installed Video Memory 16 MB 

Storage 
Hard Drive Model IBM TravelStar IC25N040ATCS05-0 
Hard Drive Capacity 40 GB 
Hard Drive Speed 5400 RPM 
Included Drives UJDA730 DVD/CDRW 
CD Write Speed 24 X 
CD Rewrite Speed 10 X 
CD Read Speed 24 X 
DVD Read Speed 8 X 

Display and Graphics 
Display Size 14.1 inch 
Display Type TFT active matrix 
Graphics Processor ATI Mobility 7500 RADEON 
Included Video Card Graphics card - AGP 4x 
Resolution 1024 x 768 pixels 
Max. External Resolution 2048 x 1536 pixels 

Battery 
Battery Model 6 cell 10.8V, 4.4AH 
Battery Life 2.3 hours (real Linux: ~2 hours) 
Battery Type Lithium ion 

Communications and Networking 
Modem Speed 56 kbps 
Network LAN Intel Pro/100 VE 

Software 
Shipped Operating System Microsoft Windows XP Professional 

Connectors 
Interface Provided Parallel Port, S-Video, VGA, Phone line, Headphone, Ethernet 10Base-T/100Base-TX, Ultrabay(TM) 2000 Plus, PCMCIA (Type III) 
Connectors 2 x USB 1.1, 1 x parallel - IEEE 1284 (EPP/ECP) - 25 pin D-Sub (DB-25), 1 x display / video - VGA - 15 pin HD D-Sub (HD-15), 1 x infrared - IrDA, 1 x modem - phone line - RJ-11, 1 x network - Ethernet 10Base-T/100Base-TX - RJ-45, 1 x display / video - S-video output - 4 pin mini-DIN, 1 x docking / port replicator, 1 x microphone - input - mini-phone mono 3.5 mm , 1 x audio - line-out/headphones - mini-phone stereo 3.5 mm, 1 x audio - line-in - mini-phone stereo 3.5 mm 

General Product Info 
Input Devices Keyboard, Touchpad, TrackPoint 
Included Sound Card AD1881A AC97 
Security Embedded Security Subsystem (TCPA compliant) 
Weight 2.5 kg 

Dimension 36.6 mm x 304 mm x 250 mm (HxWxD)
author: Blond
